meaning: She is the rain of nectar (amruta varsha) that extinguishes the forest fire (dhava) known as samsara (bhava).
commentary: The result Nandi-vidya upasana (worship) is being explained here. This birth that we have taken was a result of some karmas performed earlier. Life with all its ups and downs is like a terrible forest fire. She showers the rain of nectar and extinguishes it.
